nl.inl.blacklab.search.ConcordanceType

    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.

    • Uses of ConcordanceType in nl.inl.blacklab.search

      Fields in nl.inl.blacklab.search declared as ConcordanceType 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ConcordanceType Searcher.DEFAULT_CONC_TYPE 
      Methods in nl.inl.blacklab.search that return ConcordanceType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConcordanceType HitsSettings.concordanceType()
      Are we making concordances using the forward index (true) or using the content store (false)? Forward index is more efficient but returns concordances that don't include XML tags.
      ConcordanceType Hits.getConcordanceType()
      Deprecated. 
      use settings().concordanceType()
      ConcordanceType Searcher.getDefaultConcordanceType()
      Deprecated. 
      use hitsSettings().concordanceType()
      static ConcordanceType ConcordanceType.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static ConcordanceType[] ConcordanceType.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in nl.inl.blacklab.search with parameters of type ConcordanceType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HitsSettings.setConcordanceType(ConcordanceType type)
      Do we want to retrieve concordances from the forward index or from the content store? Forward index is more efficient but doesn't exactly reproduces the original XML.
      void Hits.setConcordanceType(ConcordanceType type)
      Deprecated. 
      use settings().setConcordanceType()
      void Searcher.setDefaultConcordanceType(ConcordanceType type)
      Deprecated. 
      use hitsSettings().setConcordanceType()
